title: Strengthening Organizational Development Competencies: Online Language Teaching Method Design Using Digital Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can independently design and execute language learning activities using digital tools.
Learners can utilize learning modules reflecting social, cognitive, and facilitative interactions in mobile environments at over 80% proficiency.
Learners can explain three or more formative and summative assessment strategies suitable for new language environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
